file_content.text: I know you can't bring my brother back, but I appreciate what you did.
Those snipers won't be a problem anymore.
They're dead? I... I can't believe it. I've been dreaming of this moment ever since they killed my brother.
Couldn't think about anything else. Barely ate. Barely slept. Thought I'd feel better after they were dead. But I just feel... numb.
Killing those snipers won't bring your brother back. You know that now.
You still miss your brother.
The snipers had to be stopped. But you will not find comfort in their deaths.
Revenge rarely brings peace.
It's not easy being a soldier. Sometimes all the bloodshed just leaves you empty inside.
War will do that to you.
Yeah, maybe. My brother was always there for me. It's going to be strange carrying on without him.
You're just looking for some closure. Kick a few credits my way, and it'll buy you some peace of mind.
Pay me and you'll feel better.
I'm worried about you.
I just need some time. I'll be okay.
They didn't go out peacefully. I made sure they paid in full for what they did.
They suffered, if that helps.
Not sure that makes me feel any better. Doesn't make me feel worse, though.
Here, a token of my appreciation. It's not much, but my brother would want you to have it. I want you to have it.
Maybe tonight I'll finally be able to sleep without seeing his face every time I close my eyes.
Those snipers killed my brother. Somebody has to make them pay.
Hey! You gotta help me. Seriously. No one believes me. They think I'm crazy. But I know what I saw!
Gotta act fast, though. Won't be there for long. Poof. Gone. Vanished. Just like last time.
I can't help you if you freak out. Get a grip on yourself.
Hey! Hold it together!
You're rambling. Take a moment to collect your thoughts.
Calm yourself and start over.
Okay. Right. Sorry. Need to get some sleep. I've been out scouting for three straight days.
I think the stress of combat got to be a little too much for you.
Sounds like shell shock.
It's not stress. I just need sleep. I've been out scouting the area for three days straight.
Lay off the spice, kid. That stuff will kill you.
Great. You're hallucinating.
I'm not on the spice! I just need some sleep. I've been out scouting the area for three straight days.
Whoa. Slow down.
Quit bothering me.
You're working for the Republic, right? Trying to drive the Imps off of Balmorra? I can help you!
Name's Chedd. I'm with the resistance. Spotted a couple Imperial snipers a few days ago. Followed them back to their base.
Ran back here to report the location. We gotta hit them before they move. Only nobody believes me.
They don't believe a scout?
I don't have a great track record lately. The snipers killed my brother last month. Been tracking them ever since... even if it means staying out all night.
Not getting a lot of sleep. The others think it's affecting my judgment.
This whole planet is overrun with Imperials. What makes these snipers so important?
Who cares about a few snipers?
They've been picking off our people for months. Over a hundred kills. Last month, they got my brother.
I get the feeling you're telling the truth.
I believe you.
I wouldn't lie about this. Those snipers killed my brother.
Everyone thinks I'm obsessed with avenging him. They think I'm cracking up. Claim I'm seeing things that aren't there.
They tried to pull me off patrol. But I wouldn't quit. I knew I could find these guys. But I can't take them out myself.
I'll do it.
I might be persuaded to help.
I can't put a price on my brother's life. But if it means getting the scum that killed him, I can come up with something.
The snipers set up camp inside an Imperial-controlled settlement nearby. Probably figured nobody would go after them there.
I know I'm asking a lot. But I'm counting on you. Make them pay for what they did.
I don't care. [Refuse quest]
Fine. I'll find someone else to help me. I don't need you.
Not in the mood for talk. Out on patrol all night. Gotta get some rest.
